description: President of the Student Council and one of the Three Beauties of Seitetsu, she is a model student with perfect attendance record. In addition, however, she is also a Red Kämpfer fighting with the Schwert ability of wielding two chained daggers at will. She wants to expose Moderator`s intentions but has no problem fighting Blue Kämpfers until that goal was accomplished. After being spared following a defeat, she enters a truce with Natsuru and Akane and has since taken an interest in Natsuru despite being constantly treated with suspicion.
name: Sangou Shizuku
